column4: Nice pizzas. Very large ones so it would be more than enough. You may need to book a table on busy nights. I would recommend for a large group friends, dinner date, or friends.
Great, small Italian restaurant with authentic pizza, nice beer and excellent service... usually you have to book before you visit .... if you re in the area do not miss it !!!
I loved the pizza! And the bufala starter was amazing too!! The staff is friendly and the service is very fast! Recommended!
The only place for Pizzas in Paris! Book in advance to avoid disappointment. Simply irresistible! Cozy and great service.
Came here during a work trip to Paris. One of the nicest pizzas Iâ€™ve ever had. Good pizza menu, buzzing atmosphere and Aperol Spritz! Will come again!
Iâ€™ve tried different pizzerias in Paris since 2012 and this one is the very best. If you like spicy pizza, recommend the Calabria.

In my opinion itâ€™s very over rated and expensive â‚¬15 for half a pizza with 3 slices of speck 3 pieces of mozzarella. The pizza was not bad but ate much much better for that price. Reviews not telling the really truth.

We had a great birthday night at papacionu! Delicious pizzas and salads, great wines, and the perfect atmosphere to enjoy your meal. The staff was also very kind !Thanks a lot, we''ll back again for sure!
The restaurant serve really good pizza and especiall I have eaten an amazing quatttro formaggio there. starters were also very good. definately recommended.
Great fresh ingredients combined to make exciting pizzas. We got takeaway pizza rather than eat in. Prices were reasonable for the size of the pizza. Truffle pizza is recommended.

column3: I'm trying to make a booking
column4: I'm trying to book a table and the lady told me to wait for 1min then just totally forgot me! I have waited for like 7min and heard everything going on over the phone and nobody took care of me!!!!! the service just sucks!!! ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡
I always visit here when I want the best mozzarella and salade planche absolutely lovely and creamy.
Main course of pizza was good. Desert was mehh and the coffie I ordered with the desert never came. Would rate 4 stars if judging by main dish only.
Le Papaciounu makes good pizzas and the restaurant both inside and out is welcoming. We visited them just before they closed for summer holidays so unfortunately were able to go only one time.

column3: Great wood oven pizza at sidewalk cafe-type pizzeria on cute pedestrian street.
column4: Great and unique wood oven pizza restaurant. Nice sized portions, maybe even too big if youâ€™re a hotel guest and canâ€™t bring leftovers home. Great recommendation from the staff at Hotel Opera Cadet.

The place is small but cozy; service is very friendly! The pizza is very good: Iâ€™m not quite sure, but I think itâ€™s the Roman one, considering the shape and the dough. I had the burrata with mustard one. I recommend!

Excellent thin crust pizza, generous sized pizza at a reasonable price, buzzing with customers, many who are local which is a sign of good quality. Menu available in different languages, waiters spoke English which was brilliant as my French knowledge is lacking.
Lovely cute place which was perfect as travelling solo for first night in Paris. Pizza was amazing and a good size for me (I like my food!). Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Not bad price!
Great find, really good choice of tasty pizzas. Ambiance cosy and would definitely come back. Family of five. Children just as happy as the adults. Staff very helpful and efficient.
A good tasting Italian restaurant in a cosy setting. The four cheese Pizza was just right and the service effective. An easy reach from the gallery Lafayette.
Excellent thin crust pizzas, but get there early as the tables are reserved. Menus are available in English. Friendly staff and good beer on tap.
Good food, good service. Many good comments have been said about this place and it is true. We were lucky to get the last table but really you should book... you won't be disappointed
Dropped by without reservation on a Saturday evening. Were squeezed in, just : thank you. Very lively, very quick, very friendly, very tasty. Very happy - highly recommended. Book ahead in season.
We had a quick dinner here with a group of 8 people and the service was quick, the food delicious and the atmosphere was great. Everything I expect from a restaurant. Simply good.
Enjoyed a pleasant lunch here with great service and lovely pizzas. Great range of slightly different pizzas which both tasted fresh and packed with flavour. Good wine range too.
Came here with locals, pizza was good, panache excellent, the service was friendly and quick.. I couldn't finish the food since it was a lot..
We didn't finished eating and I had to praise the pizzas!! Excellent!! Parfait!! Recommendation for all pizza lovers!

Le Papacionu was a nice surprise to find in Paris. Such a lovely, small Italian pizzeria with great French wine served there. Most kind and welcoming staff, one of best pizzas I have ever had! Also very affordable.
We ordered pizza and a calzone .Both of them were absolutely tasteful!The place is very beautiful too.Very interesting - vintage decoration.I will definitely visit it again !
Really authentic, delicious pizza. Lots of choice on the menu and a lovely, lively atmosphere. Went early on a Friday night and it was packed by 8.30. Don't miss it!

Lovely thin crust, topped with fresh ingredients. Sat at the high tables in the bar area, was served by friendly staff who clearly enjoy working there. Not too pricey, good selection of wines but above all, good pizza!
This restaurant was near our hotel in Paris and we decided to stop in there for an evening meal. Delicious ingredients, delicious pizza and delicious wine. Perfect!

Visited for dinner on a Wednesday evening, chosen due to good TA reviews. So glad we went, excellent authentic pizzas, lots of choice, delicious desserts and a friendly little place! Definitely recommend.

Stumbled across this restaurant on Rue Cadet when my fiancÃ© and I were searching for a place which had been recommended for us. The atmosphere is great and the pizzas are even better. Definitely worth a visit.
Loved this little place. Great ambience and amazing pizza, would recommend to anyone visiting paris for a super chilled vibe with great food :)
